trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Aberdeen
There were no other sightings in Aberdeen on or around May 31st 1979
Summary: Looked like a orange ball of light the size of the sun,almost transparent at times.moonless night.
divs: sighting detailsserving as a mp on duty at aberdeen proving grds,my partner and i observed a orange ball of light in the sky on a moonless night at around 3am over chesapeak bay.it looked like the sun but seemed transparent at times.we had finished our security checks and went to park near the water on spesutie island.after sitting in our patrol car for a short time i saw the light of the object thru the windshild,above us.we both got out of the carand looked up at it.it was difficult to tell how far away it was but i would guess about 500yrds.after a few min the object moved swifty to our right,and then back in front\above us.it then shot srtait up.from the time i saw the object thru the windshild of our car to the time the ufo left i dont remember saying a word to my partner or he to me.it caught us both speachless.i also remember there was no clouds in the sky,a perfect clear night.after it left my partner and i talked about what we both saw.i called the mp station and told them what had happened.we were told to return to the station to fill out a report and statements.phillips airfied was called to see if they had anything on radar during the time in question.nothing was sighted on radar.the object gave you a strange feeling inside.somehow i new i wasnt just looking at a light in sky but something intellegent.back at the mp station we all kind of made light of it but i knew something just wasnt right with it.the more i thought about it the more it seemed like the orange vapor was conceiling something within itself.i dont know.this was a long time ago but i have always rememberd that night in aberdeen.i have often wondered if anyone else saw this.no one officially has ever talked to me about this.
